metadata.title: CVE-2024-30161 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In Qt before 6.5.6 and 6.6.x before 6.6.3, the wasm component may accessQNetworkReply header data via a dangling pointer.

criterions.comment: qt6-base package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src-gles package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
